Author: EternityShack
Description: Input a combination of red, green and blue to solve the module. Tags: hash, pound, 6-0s, 3-squares, 3-rectangles
Name: Color Generator

TwitchPlays.HelpText: !{0} press bigred 3,smallred 1,biggreen 7,smallblue 1 [presses those buttons those numbers of times] | !{0} press smallblue UseRedOnSolve/UseOffOnSolve [change the color of the status light when solved] | !{0} tellmeastory [tell a story] | !{0} needystart/needyend [make a needy sound] | !{0} faksestrike | !{0} troll
